document.full_text: tennessee has fired bruce pearl after a season that saw the coach charged with unethical conduct for lying to n.c.a.a. investigators during a probe into recruiting.
document.title: tennessee fires coach bruce pearl
lines_and_colors: tennessee has fired bruce pearl after a season that saw the coach charged with unethical conduct for lying to n.c.a.a. investigators during a probe into recruiting.
